definition: to exaggerate/empty/in vain/old variant of 螗[tang2]

sentences.english: I hear there's a place in Chinatown where you can take some courses.
sentences.chinese: 我聽說唐人街有個地方開這種課，你有興趣嗎？

sentences.english: you just go to online and find out Chinatown best restaurants, and you can have it.
sentences.chinese: 你只要上網搜索唐人街最好的餐廳，你就能找到。

sentences.english: Jiang is planning a trip to Chinatown with Lance.
sentences.chinese: 蔣和蘭斯計劃去唐人街觀光。

sentences.english: There are also horse-driven carriages, especially in Chinatown and other touristy places.
sentences.chinese: 除此以外還有馬車，特別是在唐人街和其他旅遊勝地。

sentences.english: It's got a picture of Chinatown, in New York.
sentences.chinese: 它有一張唐人街的圖，在紐約。

sentences.english: List the countries and the places which have China Town.
sentences.chinese: 說說什麼國傢什麼地方有唐人街？

sentences.english: A quiet park to sit and rest after walking around Chinatown .
sentences.chinese: 遊覽完唐人街後可以小坐和休息的公園。

sentences.english: I would vote for wong kee restaurant for collective memories.
sentences.chinese: 英國華人的集團回憶，我會選唐人街的牌樓。

sentences.english: Can you describe people in Chinatown?
sentences.chinese: 你能描述一下在唐人街的人嗎？

sentences.english: Can you tell us about Chinatown?
sentences.chinese: 你能跟我們講講唐人街嗎？

sentences.english: Chinatowns first appeared in the major cities of North America in the 19th Century.
sentences.chinese: 唐人街於19世紀首次出現在北美洲的主要城市中。

sentences.english: And I think Chinatown has some of the cheapest foods in New York.
sentences.chinese: 我想唐人街有些紐約最便宜的食物。

sentences.english: Well, in Chinatown, they have jewelries.
sentences.chinese: 在唐人街他們有珠寶賣。

sentences.english: The whole of Chinatown was destroyed and only one building was left standing on the top of Nob Hill.
sentences.chinese: 整個唐人街都被毀了，僅剩下羅步山頂上的一棟建築。

sentences.english: Could you recommend any restaurants in Chinatown?
sentences.chinese: 你能推薦一些唐人街的餐廳嗎？

definition: Chinatown/also called 唐人街[Tang2 ren2 jie1]
Manhattan island/Manhattan borough of New York City

pinyin: Te4 la1 fa3 jia1 Guang3 chang3
